Uses of Interface
com.i2group.apollo.client.handlers.IClientHandler

Packages that use IClientHandler
com.i2group.apollo.client Contains interfaces and a class for interacting with the Intelligence Analysis Platform through the supplied Java client. 
com.i2group.apollo.client.handlers Contains classes and interfaces that provide access to information that is communicated between the supplied Java client and the Intelligence Analysis Platform. 
com.i2group.apollo.client.handlers.implementation   
 

Uses of IClientHandler in com.i2group.apollo.client
 

Method parameters in com.i2group.apollo.client with type arguments of type IClientHandler
static IClientFactory ClientFactoryFactory.createClientFactory(String url, Iterable<? extends IClientHandler> connectionHandlers)
          Creates and returns an IClientFactory for the Intelligence Analysis Platform deployment at the specified URL, using the specified IClientHandlers.
 

Uses of IClientHandler in com.i2group.apollo.client.handlers
 

Subinterfaces of IClientHandler in com.i2group.apollo.client.handlers
 interface IHTTPConnectionHandler
          A pair of methods that modify the HttpURLConnections between a client and the Intelligence Analysis Platform document upload and download servlets.
 interface ISOAPMessageHandler
          An extension of the standard Java SOAPHandler interface, for modifying the headers of SOAP messages between a client and the Intelligence Analysis Platform web services.
 

Classes in com.i2group.apollo.client.handlers that implement IClientHandler
 class LocaleAndTimeZoneHandler
          A handler that adds HTTP headers that contain locale and time zone information to the requests that clients make to the Intelligence Analysis Platform web service.
 class LtpaAuthenticationHandler
          A handler that provides authentication functionality to the requests from a client to an Intelligence Analysis Platform web service.
